K = int(raw_input())
S = raw_input()

if len(S) > K:
    print(S[:K] + '...')
else:
    print(S)

# AtCoder Beginner Contest 089
# A - Grouping 2
# https://atcoder.jp/contests/abc089/tasks/abc089_a

N = int(input())
print(N // 3)
k = int(input())
s = input()

if len(s) <= k:
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + "...")
